answerText: Dandelion Wine[10] This author of Dandelion Wine wrote about the conflicted book-burning fireman Guy Montag in his novel Fahrenheit 451.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 11 | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Leo Auffman creates a Happiness Machine that only makes his family sad and Bill Forrester attempts to plant a new type of grass that would kill off a certain plant. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel set in Green Town, Illinois that centers on the 12-year-old Douglas Spaulding, whose grandfather stores the title substance inside of ketchup bottles.
